data.message: Marshall doesn't advertise what he gives to charity. Who's to say he hasn't already donated hundreds of thousands of dollars?  If he has, he's not going to tell anyone about it.

replies.message: He definitely has! Wolverine, a charity that helps children/young adolescents in Detroit has said many times that they've received very generous donations anonymously which was later confirmed to have be donated from Marshall. He doesn't publicly tell people how much he donates or when he does because he doesn't do it for the publicity, he does it because he cares.
Yeah and he takes care of Kim who hates him and all her children and they're not even his he's stupid

Katherine Tobar Wow, that's a pretty short-sighted and insensitive comment. He adopted Whitney, so she is just as much his child as Kim's. And maybe he wants the mother of his children to be taken care of. And don't think Kim hates him. She recently said they're "like best friends" trying to raise their kids.
